page.title: 17Media - BBC Radio Derby
page.content: Founded on April 29th. 1971. BBC Local Radio is all about people and the com- munities they live in. The main studios are in Derby plus one each in Matlock and Burton. There are four different categories: Entertainment, Sport, Information and Local News. Here are some examples: {Entertainment:}there are a few games where you have to phone in to Radio Derby. {Sport:}"Sportspage" is a programme about the different sports and their results. {Information:}there are market reports to help farmers and some farmers are interviewed; there are traffic reports & you can also phone in with problems. {News:}there are both local and national news programmes and also local and national weather forecasts and reports.
